meanings.definition: Not able to be moved or changed.
meanings.sent1: The heavy rock was unbudgeable, no matter how hard we tried to push it.
meanings.sent2: The door was unbudgeable, refusing to open no matter how much we pushed.
meanings.sent3: The unbudgeable vending machine wouldn't give me my snack, no matter how much I shook it.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as unbudgeable as a mountain, unwavering in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The unbudgeable wall stood tall, blocking our path with its immovable presence.

meanings.sent1: The unbudgeable tree stood strong against the wind, its roots firmly planted in the ground.
meanings.sent2: The unbudgeable statue in the park never moved, no matter how many people passed by.
meanings.sent3: The unbudgeable cat refused to leave its cozy spot on the couch, ignoring all attempts to move it.
meanings.sent4: His beliefs were as unbudgeable as a fortress, resisting any attempts to sway his opinion.
meanings.sent5: The unbudgeable anchor kept the boat secure, even in the strongest storm.
